channel.title: Server Problem ( Please Look )
channel.description:
Hey guys, I downloaded a server from here and was going to use it for me and my brother to play on. I need some help because i've been trying to fix this for a long time and was never able to.
( All credits to the original owner of the client-source. )
The source and client I used was - ( TrisidiaX V3 Client ) ( TrisidiaX V3 Source )
Now, I made everything right. Here is what I did:
1) Downloaded 2) Changed run.bat of source to jre7 3) Ran the server ( worked ) 4) Logged in ( worked ) 5) Logged out
After doing all this I knew I did everything correctly for me to log on. After logging on I when to client.java and changed the ip to what I had. My no-ip. So when I typed my ip in and then compiled it I started the server again. But this time it was saying: Using the ip of: ( My IP ) Then I portforwarded my ip and it worked. But this one problem came up when my brother tried logging in. We've tried moparscape client and me making my own client but both failed. So when my brother typed everything in and tried logging in it logged him in than logged him right back off in a second. I saw my source cmd and it said he logged on and then deregistered. Please someone help me with this. If you need any more info I will answer it.

item.title: Server Problem ( Please Look )
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

brennan1150:

When I use my ipv4 it says its offline…?

I’m not even going to bother helping you anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem ( Please Look )
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

strucker:

if your brother is in the same house put your ipv4 adress in his client.

That doesn’t matter if he can’t connect because it’s the wrong client.

brennan1150:

Yes he is in the same house as me. I have given him my no-ip and my ipv4. I have even tried hamachi and the problem still accured. ( Registered ) and then ( Deregistered ).

Did you just ignore my previous post…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem ( Please Look )
item.dc:creator: @brennan1150 brennan1150
item.description:
@brennan1150 wrote:

My mistake, the link you gave me is the one I used. If you go that link and Search WarriorPvP and try logging in i would be interested if it logs you out when you log in aswell.

I am using the one that came with the source.

And if this all doesnt work got any source and client you reccomend? ( 614+ )

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem ( Please Look )
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

brennan1150:

Well, the first time he was using moparscape client. It logged in than out. Next I created a webclient on rsps.org and it was appearing ( online ) so he tried that and the same error.

Well. The moparscape client won’t work for trisidia what so ever, seeing as it has a custom cache. and the mopar client doesn’t. I’ve never tried rsps.org’s. But I assume it’s still a cache error.
From what I hear http://www.rswebclients.com/index2.php works.
Though, I suggest you get your own client working (the one that came with the download of the server)

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem ( Please Look )
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“brennan1150, post:1, topic:481186”]Hey guys, I downloaded a server from here and was going to use it for me and my brother to play on. I need some help because i’ve been trying to fix this for a long time and was never able to.

( All credits to the original owner of the client-source. )

The source and client I used was - ( TrisidiaX V3 Client ) ( TrisidiaX V3 Source )

Now, I made everything right. Here is what I did:

  1. Downloaded
  2. Changed run.bat of source to jre7
  3. Ran the server ( worked )
  4. Logged in ( worked )
  5. Logged out

After doing all this I knew I did everything correctly for me to log on. After logging on I when to client.java and changed the ip to what I had. My no-ip. So when I typed my ip in and then compiled it I started the server again.
But this time it was saying: Using the ip of: ( My IP )
Then I portforwarded my ip and it worked.
But this one problem came up when my brother tried logging in. We’ve tried moparscape client and me making my own client but both failed. So when my brother typed everything in and tried logging in it logged him in than logged him right back off in a second. I saw my source cmd and it said he logged on and then deregistered. Please someone help me with this. If you need any more info I will answer it.[/quote]
I would assume the client threw errors, or the server did. What client was he on when this happen?
